name: Classic Chicken Fried Rice
steps:
Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large wok or pan over high heat.
Add diced chicken and cook for 4-5 minutes until fully cooked. Remove and set aside.
Add another tablespoon of oil to the pan. Pour in beaten eggs and scramble until just set. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil to the pan. Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add carrots and peas, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Add day-old rice to the pan, breaking up any clumps. Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.
Return chicken and scrambled eggs to the pan.
Add soy sauce, sesame oil, and white pepper. Toss everything together.
Add green onions and stir for another minute.
Season with salt if needed and serve hot.
